snippet.title: Enigmatis 2: The Mists of Ravenwood - Official Trailer
snippet.description:
AVAILABLE ON: PC, Mac, iPad, iPhone, Steam, Google Play, Amazon Store, Windows Phone Store, Windows Store, BlackBerry Store

Enigmatis: The Mists of Ravenwood is the sequel to the smash hit Enigmatis: The Ghost of Maple Creek. It is a detective story rich with horror, plot twists, and shadowy intrigue.

Features:
• Uncover the secrets of Ravenwood Park in a dark detective story full of fear and intrigue
• Explore 44 hand-painted, unique locations (55 in the Collector's Edition)
• Investigate the case using the evidence table -- a unique element that helps you draw conclusions based on the evidence at hand
• 35 Achievements
• Hone your detective skills in one of three difficulty levels
• Test yourself in 18 mini-games of extreme challenge (25 in the Collector's Edition)
• Search 14 hidden-object scenes featuring over 405 hidden objects (19 scenes in the Collector's Edition)
• Collect 133 items (166 in the Collector's Edition)
• Diverse cast of characters with unique motives.
• Atmospheric soundtrack
• Collector's Edition includes a bonus adventure, replayable HO scenes, Redwood Encyclopedia, concept art collection, wallpapers and music from the game

Official Facebook Fanpage:
https://www.facebook.com/artifexmundi
